history.content:
Even if there is no guarantee that I can get into CS 170, I would still prefer to use my Phase II units on having a chance at getting into the course.

---

CS 170 and CS 188 are both held in VLSB 2050 and both classes are currently listed with a class capacity of 408 students.

 

Since there is a waitlist capacity of 320 for CS 188, there doesn't seem to be any reason that CS 170 can't have a waitlist capacity of 320 as well.

 

Thanks!

---

Assuming all 121 seats free up and 121 students get off the waitlist, there's still 30% of the class size on the waitlist already.

When compared to the usual 10% rule of thumb, I wouldn't expect all of the current students on the waitlist already to get in.

children.subject: I know non-EECS majors on the waitlist where I myself being an EECS major could not get onto the waitlist.

The enrollment policy gives CS and EECS majors priority in terms of what phase they can enroll / waitlist (namely: you can waitlist during Phase I, and if there's space during Phase II, you can directly enroll), and no priority in terms of getting off of the waitlist.

People who waitlisted during Phase II, I would assume, include people of all majors.
Do EECS majors not get priority in signing up for 170? If so, does this mean all the people enrolled and on the waitlist are EECS majors?

CS 170 and CS 188 are both held in VLSB 2050 and both classes are currently listed with a class capacity of 408 students.

Since there is a waitlist capacity of 320 for CS 188, there doesn't seem to be any reason that CS 170 can't have a waitlist capacity of 320 as well.

Thanks!

history.content: Please try again. The waitlist limits for the cs170 lecture and many discussions have been expanded.
There are 287 students enrolled, 121 available seats, and 250/250 students on the waitlist. It would make sense to enlarge the waitlist. Thanks!
history.subject: Could the waitlist capacity for CS170 be expanded?

history.content: It seems to have filled up, but there is still quite a bit of room remaining in the class. Thanks!
history.subject: Could the waitlist capacity for CS170 be expanded?
